about_the_game:
In Burning Squad, you play as an elite squad of firefighters on a mission to save the world! Armed with your specialized arsenal, traverse this 3D universe consumed by flames in a chaotic top-down shooter!
 

THE WORLD NEEDS YOU!

Nearly the entire world is engulfed in flames, and not only are they spreading, they're fighting back! Face off against a variety of enemies, from the most overwhelming to the toughest, while extinguishing fires along the way to prevent their spread and secure the area. Other obstacles will stand in your way, and only teamwork will help you overcome them!
 

TO ARMS!

Water is your best ally! Choose your weapon of choice before each mission! From close combat to long-range support, it’s up to you and your friends to find the best equipment combinations before charging into the fray!
 

BUILD A STRONG TEAM!

Four firefighters are better than two! Cooperation and communication are key to completing your mission. Just be careful not to accidentally throw your friends into the flames!
